title: Pset_AudioVisualApplianceTypeCamera
description: An audio-visual camera is a device that captures video, such as for security.  HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

IsOutdoors.title: IsOutdoors
IsOutdoors.description: Indicates if camera is designed to be used outdoors.

VideoResolutionWidth.title: VideoResolutionWidth
VideoResolutionWidth.description: Indicates the number of horizontal pixels (the largest native video resolution width).

VideoResolutionHeight.title: VideoResolutionHeight
VideoResolutionHeight.description: Indicates the number of vertical pixels (the largest native video resolution height).

VideoCaptureInterval.title: VideoCaptureInterval
VideoCaptureInterval.description: Indicates video frame capture time intervals.

TiltHorizontal.title: TiltHorizontal
TiltHorizontal.description: Indicates horizontal range for pivoting, where positive values indicate the camera rotating clockwise,

TiltVertical.title: TiltVertical
TiltVertical.description: Indicates vertical range for pivoting, where 0.0 is level, +90 degrees is looking up, -90 degrees is looking down.
